title: Trump hints economic adviser Hassett may be Fed chair pick
description: US President Donald Trump on Tuesday hinted that he wants to nominate his chief economic adviser Kevin Hassett to replace outgoing Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell next year. Introducing guests at a White House event attended by Hassett, Trump said: “It…
content:
Kevin Hassett is a frequent face on television, touting Trump's economic policies - Copyright AFP SAUL LOEB
